case.state: Im here to inspire the world with magic!
I'm here! I made it! I only got a little lost.
Huh? Lotte, who was this? I thought I told you about the game...?
Yay! I was told thisd be a great place to show off some magic for an interested audience!
Yay! Thisll be fun!
Ready, set, go!
Oh, you're here too, Professor Croix? That's kind of weird, I haven't seen you in forever!
Well, anyway, let's have fun!
Yay, another witch! Raven, you are a witch, right?
Ryuko, are you talking to your sword? I actually got to ride a super fast broom that looks a lot like your weapon!
Sheena, you're dressed in purple and are going to use magic? Did you graduate from Luna Nova too?
Oh, Lotte, did I take a wrong turn on the leyline? I thought we were going to be playing strip poker tonight?
Yay! It's so nice to see all of you! But who's this ~player~ person?
Wow! There's so many mages and witches and sorcerers and demons and spirits and spellcasters and enchanters and... we're all so magic tonight!
Witch problem? What kind of world would have a problem with witches?
Oh wow! So many monsters tonight. I think you'll love my performance!
Oh! I'm going to be playing a show for the fairies tonight, that's great!
Hm... I dunno if you can, Sayaka, I'm pretty good at numbers. And I'm the only witch here, so...
I've got my Shiny Rod, Sayaka. Don't worry, I'll keep you safe and entertained! No need to get slicy slicy stabby stabby over it.
Oh! Lots of other witches tonight! This'll be super fun! I bet you've never seen a show like mine!
Yay! ~cards~!
Well, that last hand was fine, but gimme ~cards~ this time!
Perfect! Just ~cards~!
Okay okay okay! I got this! ~cards~!
Oh, crap! ~cards~ or thisll get bad!
Hummm ~cards~?
Ha! Time for the best hand ever, ~cards~!
Gimme ~cards~!
Ew! ~cards~ that arent sticky! Please!
Metamorphie how do you transform ~cards~? Oh! Right! Metamorphie papiesse!
Metamorphie how do you transform ~cards~?
Haha! Yay!
Yay! Not as good as a Chariot limited card, but still a great hand!
Uwwwh... I'm still hungry. Are you sure there's no snacks here besides drinks?
Hmm what would Chariot do?
Hmmm! This is pretty good!
Awwwh, can I use a spell to change these? No? Grumble...
Who would want these?! These are like that juice that gives you frog legs!
Uwaaaaah! Come on!
Adventures!? I love those! I've had to do all kinds of stuff. I recently played a show in Australia! Everything was kind of upside-down though, so I did my set in reverse order.
Hm... as long as it doesn't cause another big rocket, Professor, I trust you not to do bad guy stuff?
Professor, is it still okay if we play this together? And is it still okay if I call you Professor, even though you kind of got fired?
Hm... I love stuff like they play at parades! Big music with lots of bands and brass and stuff! Yeah!
Ooooo-kayyy, Hanako. I definitely don't think you're a Witch of the Primal Chaos. Those burn marks are definitely just an accident. Riiiiight.
I'm not dumb. You don't need to rub it in, Ini. Unless you want to rub yourself.
But you can't, can you, Ini? Ha! Who's the dumb one now!? It's Ini! Duh!
Talk schmalk. You lose, I win; you're a liar, I'm a genius. We allllll know how it goes.
Kamina, you're really big on believing in yourself, right? Me too! I think encouraging people is just the absolute best thing anyone can ever do!
Hey, Kamina, I had a question: what's up with your sunglasses? Are they some kind of magic item? I'd never give up Shiny Rod, so I figured...
Kamina, I had another question! What do your tattoos mean? They're neat, but I can't find any magic in them.
Kyu, I think I kinda like this guy Andrew, but I think I also kinda like this girl Diana too. What am I supposed to do?
S-sure, Lotte, whatever you say. It's none of my business, and it's not like we'd ever kiss like you and Amanda. ...And Barbera, apparently.
Hmm... besides, how would you even be bad at masturbation? Like, you only cum once?
I don't get why you're so embarrassed, Lotte, it's not like I haven't seen you naked before.
Oh well, Im good at working at things, but I think Id rather focus on magic than boys or girls
Hmmm! Someone really brave and smart and really good with magic! I'd love to fall in love with someone like that!
O-ho! I see what Natsukis doing! And what shes wearing! Youre pretty sneaky, Natsuki, so its lucky it makes you look even sweeter than a strawberry tart!
Hm... I could use murowa but I'm mostly good at physical transformations, and some illusions. I could try if you wanted!
Nope! Not even a little evil! Mischevious, sometimes. But evil, never! I want to use magic to inspire people, Navi!
Huh!? What the heck! I thought for sure I banished that spirit! Darn it!
Oh that's a tough one... hm... I love pie, though... oh, and tarts.
Hmm Just Er studying away here! Like a powerful sorceress! Yep! (Hes kinda a stereotypical hero, so I should I wish I had guidance on this, Chariot!)
Yknow, Pit, Im pretty great at cards. Er, at least some card games. Anyway, if you lose before me, how about you let me summon you to teach you how to play better?! Its a challenge! Yep! Sure is!
You know, Pit, I think Ive heard of an eggplant wizard, but Im certainly seeing a different kind of eggplant right now
Hey, you! Man with the wings! Did you mess up a transformation spell too? Dont worry, Im good at fixing those! Cmere!
Hm. I guess that makes sense. I like simple panties myself. I can always just use magic to transform them if I need a sexy pair.
Well, for a girl who seems sooooo confident, you sure brought a lot of friends--your magic armor, your best friend...
Where can I get one of those, Ryuko?! I love my transformation magic, but that's so cool! I could really do hero stuff!
Of course I can hear him talking! Lotte's way better, but what kind of witch would I be if I couldn't do the basics, Ryuko?
I told you, you're my rival for this game! I'm not gonna lose, Ryuko!
Hey, Sakura, I've known one zombie who was just driven to find his daughter. Does your love of dancing keep you reanimated?
Sakura, you aren't one of those boks, are you? You know, the spitting ghouls?
I'm really glad you're so... well, you, Sakura! They say that the dark matter that animates undead slowly causes them to lust for vengeance against the living!
Hm... you know, Sakura, maybe if you guys slowly introduced Franchouchou as being zombie idols, it would go a long way to accepting people who are mortally challenged!
You know, I've never heard of Mitakihara City, is that in Japan somewhere...?
Hey, Sayaka, we got so caught up in talking about witches and magical girls and spirits and magic that we didn't even get to talk about Japan!
We didn't really get to talk about Japan, Sayaka, but you look Japanese with that wild pubic hair. Whenever I go home, people always get way too personal about how I do mine.
Well... you definitely look Japanese, Sayaka! I went to school in Europe, so, I like to keep my hair down there more neat. It's cute that you just let it go wild, though!
Yeech. Anything but vodka. Ive had enough potatoes to last a lifetime oh! Whats this thing called a Shine Spark!? That! That!
Uhm. Like in the butt, Sei? I dont know I think with enough magic or shapeshifting anything is possible but does it really feel good? I don't wanna hurt...
Well, even if you aren't, this'll be fun! I always like to see new types of magic!
Oh you tried that potion from the magic item cafe, didnt you, Tsuyu! The one that gives you frog legs!
Aww, c'mon, Sheena, you know to round out the loss, you have to masturbate, don't you?
Hmm Sucy said that there might be some cool magic here Er Im kind of doubtful about that But all the more reason to inspire the rest of you!
Hmm! Wait! Wait a second! Natsuki, you cant have ~player~ and Pit! Thats not fair! I saw them at the same time you did! Since you got greedy, Im going to seduce both of them!
A good witch, her dark counterpart, an innocent maiden, and a gunslinger. Wait a second! I've heard of this one before!
I know, I know, you're all big fans, but let me do my intro, 'kay? I toooootally didn't forget!
My name's Akko! I've wanted to become a witch ever since I watched Shiny Chariot perform a magic show when I was little.
Hey! If any of you like my magic, my school's always recruiting! It's called Luna Nova and has a rich heritage and blah blah blah, you're here to see people get naked, right?

Luna Nova's the place where I learned all my magic! But, it's also where Shiny Chariot went to school, so it's a pretty amazing place. Sorta like how everyone here is from all these worlds and times and stuff.
You guys know Shiny Chariot, right? NO?! But she's the coolest! Um... she was a pioneer of stage magic, kind of like what I'm doing, but even more fantastic! Trust me! She's the best!
Shiny Chariot's pretty much the greatest stage magician ever. Buuuut I don't think she ever had the idea of performing for people who wanted to get naked.
I'm a pretty amazing witch, and I travel around putting on performances to inspire people with magic and to believe in magic. It's totally my dream job!
I had to work really hard, but I made it! I'm just trying to show everyone how amazing magic can be!
I know that some of you think that magic's not popular, and not real, but I'm here to show you all how magical our world can be!
This? Oh! This is the "Claimh Solais," or "Rod of Seven Stars." It lets me do really cool magic! I just call it the Shiny Rod, though.
I really want you all to smile! If that means I need to pick up the pace, let me know!
Pffft. I'm amazing at Poker. I played the crap out of my Chariot game, remember? And I never lost except when I let you and Sucy win!
Hey, Lotte, did you know there was a sale on books from that Alhazred guy's store? Klaatu... verata... nicktu?
Uh-uh-uh! Um! L-Lotte, be careful how you phrase things!
I'm cute and I'm good! I'm not very accurate, but... metamorphie--!
Hm... how to prove to Navi that I'm good... oh! How about this transformation!
Well, let's show you this spell, Navi!
Aww, Navi! I'm a friend to all fairies! I'm a great and goodly witch!
Sure! Live music is great, but I'm actually going to do kind of a poetry reading from this book I found...
I guess we're gonna team up then, huh, Sakura?
Excuse me!? What did a witch ever do to you!?
If I were really an evil witch, would I show off my magic--
Um yeah, I guess thats true. But like some people say: If you love what you do, youll never work a day in your life!
Well theres this boy but theres also this girl!
No! Not at all! Ive worked super, super hard to accomplish my dreams!
N-no were definitely not supposed tooooo
What the heck!? Im not slow!
I caaan...
Ouch. Youre kind of right to the point, arent you?
I like to do a lot of really active magic! Flashy stuff like Murowa for fireworks...
What, Atsuko Kagari? Its kind of long isnt it?
Huh? Like my Shiny Chariot limited edition figurines?
Oh yeah! Theyre some of my best friends! Lotte Jansson and Sucy Manbanvaran! Lottes here, but if youre watching us from home, Sucy, hiiiiii! ...Shes probably not though.
Well, obviously, you should use magic to help others.
You think Im a good shapeshifter? Hows your magic different?
Oh yeah! Theyre some of my best friends! Lotte Jansson and Sucy Manbanvaran! Hiiiii if you two are watching this from home!
Wow! Lots of undead. This is called "The Book of the Dead", so it's probably great for-- uh... UH!!!
Uhhhh... could one of you explain what "I! Shub-Niggurath!" means?
Awwh. Fiiine... hold on! I have a great idea for this! Let me show you one of my favorite transformations!
Okay, let me show you something cool at least... Let's gooooo! Watch this, watch this!
Oh, that might be it! ...Wait, is that the one where you're sexual twice a week, or the one where it's once every two weeks?
Im Atsuko Kagari and Im-- I LOST? ON THE FIRST HAND? Uwaaaagh!
Huh? Why's everyone looking at me? I didn't want to steal the show so soon.
I picked up this book on the way here. I figured I'd give it a look to see if there's any cool spells, y'know? Klaatu... verata... nicktu?
Oh, that might be it! ...Wait, is that the one where you're sexual twice a week, or the one where it's once every two weeks?
Im Atsuko Kagari and Im-- I LOST? ON THE FIRST HAND? Uwaaaagh!
Hey! Wait a second! The games barely even started yet! I really better start putting on a show if I want you guys to get a good impression!
Uwaaah! But Im barely more dressed than anyone! That's okay, though! Watch this!
Oh, that might be it! ...Wait, is that the one where you're sexual twice a week, or the one where it's once every two weeks?
Im Atsuko Kagari and Im-- I LOST? ON THE FIRST HAND? Uwaaaagh!
Metamorphie faciesse!
Metamorphie vestesse! Hm. This feels a little familiar... Kind of like Chariot's outfit.
Metamorphie faciesse! Dreams do come true! But now, I'm coming after you!
Metamorphie vestesse! Oh, crap. Sorry Lotte.
Metamorphie faciesse! Er... Sorry, I thought Lotte was gonna lose...
Metamorphie faciesse! Er... Lotte's kind of distracting. That fanfiction stuff's really magical!
Well if its for the show yes! Once, Sucy and Lotte made me do it! Um. For them. Then with them
I havent seen you use much of it tonight
Er well, being a traveling, performing witch certainly makes a lot of people happy, and Id never give up on that!
The boys nice, and always super interested in my magic, but the other girls a witch, and shes super good at it, but she can be kind of stuck up.
So mean! I just got a little lost along the way. Do you know how hard it is to prepare for a show like this one?!
I got up early and stayed up late practicing my magic-- hold this--
I-Ive worked really hard to get where I am. Sure, Im not always the best, but I always try really hard!
Oh, are yours the poseable kind? I always thought that sentai stuff was pretty cool!
Metamorphie faciesse! W-whoops! I-I meant transformation magic
Er can you actually use anything but Explosion anyway? My lightshows are very uplifting
I-I um, er. I dont mind questions from fans or stuff
Um Other people find it kind of weird, so I tend not to get to do stuff with it, but its always easy to look a certain way a partner might want me to look, I guess
Metamorphie vestesse! Hey, wait a second... Ochako, is this your outfit? It's so... loose on me!
You know, Sucy might have fun here, right, Lotte, so many vict-- test subjects that arent me for once!

Lottes a great witch! She works super hard to make really cool magic items. She also writes porn, so I think shed love this game! And Sucy does um well, mushroomy, Sucy things, I guess. This is what Lotte looks like!
Go, ~name~! You can do it!
Yay! I mean winning is fun, right? I dont wanna be mean to ~name~ or anything

Yay! Um. Not that I really wanted to see ~name~ lose
And thats a win for Akko!
Hmm! (Club? I dont think Pits human!)

(That Monikas got some weird magic about her. Im going to help you win over ~player~, but youre going to help me with Pit, kay?)
Ehehe, so, I think for our double date, Pit
I kinda dont think theres anything wrong, considering the type of game this is
Uh, Akko is fine but I dont think Pits from a club but if he was, that club wouldnt hate witches, right, Pit?
Hmm Hey, Pit, Im still watching, but ignore me whispering to Natsuki, kay?
(Psst! Natsuki! I got this! Watch this, kay!?)

Sooo, Pit, do you uh, have fun date ideas for Natsuki?

I hope that wasn't too competitive of me, Kamina...

Hmm... all equally good options. He's really bold, so maybe his boxers... what would I do if I were a manly man instead of a super-cute witch...?
Okay! An inspiring speech is always a great thing!
Darn it. If I'd thought harder, I'd have kept a super cool cape for last...
(Hmm Pits not a human so he probably doesnt hate witches and hes really handsome)

Youre serious that the wings are part of you, right? Like you arent just cosplaying or something? I know a few people like that

Yay! Ive won!

I'm sad too. It looks really comfortable!

Chun-Li!? Wow! You're that suuuper famous martial artist, right?
I'm pretty durable, but I'm super good at transmutation and shapeshifting magic!
I love your attitude! I'm gonna hang in there too, Chun-Li!

I wish there were only five types of girls people are so complicated!
Bleh... Sorry, Corrin, but after the Fafnir incident, I'm not too terribly fond of dragons...
Huh? Why wouldn't you participate?
Oh! Oh! I know the answer to this!
You know, Professor, you seem real familiar with Chariot. Real familiar.
Yay! I'm glad that things are going well, Professor!
Don't worry about that, Professor! Being generous keeps everyone inspired and happy!
Not that it's any of my business, but... um...
You're an Ice Witch, Evie?
Um... so what are you going to strip? You didn't really bring any clothes...
So... Are you gonna shave again?
You're good, right? You're not gonna run away again?
That does tend to be a witchy thing. Something about connecting to nature or whatever
Hanako, are you one of those Chaos Witches?
Hmm... your uniform is pretty normal for a witch who wields the primal and arcane imitation of The First Flame, Hanako.
Hanako, you haven't been bringing the mood down! I'm sorry I've been bugging you over magic the whole time.
I'm actually super jealous of you, Hanako!
You have great taste in underwear too!
I guess I'm about to look upon some forbidden lore...
You're supposed to be the Brightest Witch in this Generation!?
Your school is called what, Hermione?
Your school is called Hogwarts?
If any of you are mean to her, I will kick your butt! I'll transform into something big and scary like-- like-- uh...
Your last name isn't... Cavendish, is it?
Your sword was really cool, and you're not a Cavendish, so I'm actually excited to see what you have next!
Your dress is already coming off? I know you look like Diana, but she has so much more restraint--
It's Jura again! I'm really glad you're here tonight, Jura!
I'm surprised your dress isn't... well, floofier. Aren't Cinderella kits supposed to make ballgowns?
It's not like you've left anything to the imagination, so maybe you could tell me a cool space pirate story?
Another performer?! This'll be great, what are you taking off?

Say, Kizuna, are you... really superintelligent?
Y-you're really getting me into this, Kizuna!
Woah! I didn't expect to see a fairy here!
Shouldn't you let Lotte read that, Streaming-chan?
Waaaait a second... Lotte, didn't I use your crystal ball to book this show? I must have used your username...
Really! I can do some magic right now--
It was great! She made super good friends with people like me!
Whoa, Lotte! I didn't know you liked my transformations that much!
Awww, I wanted this turn.
Lotte's a really good writer, too!
OH! Lotte, did you want me to transform to distract her?
Well, yeah, obviously. But my type of magic tends to be better for that, right?
...Didn't you already ask me this, Streaming-chan?
Go Lotte! You can do it!
Cheer up, Lotte! We're doing this together!
Lotte! You're so red!
Well, I guess if they see yours first, Lotte, then mine might look really sexy!
Lotte! But what about your glasses?
I think Lotte's freckles are really cool!
Aww, don't worry, Lotte! I've seen you naked plenty of times! Just pretend it's like that time I turned your clothes into clouds in front of Professor Maybury!

What ever you decide, I'm sure it'll be flashy! You want to take good pictures, right?
Wooooah...
Yeah! But Im a witch and shes something else?
Hmm seems kind of suspicious to me!
So, what's next, your mask?
So, when are you going to transform again, Marinette!?

Hmmm... Meia, do you have any trainees or anything like that? Or... maybe some berth space?
It's okay, Meia! I've lost a lot and made a lot of dumb mistakes!
Wait a second... Mia...
Hi, Misato!
Oh no! How did a succubus get here?
Ugh... I'd give Luna Nova such a name if I lost to you...
Begone monster! You don't belong in this world!
(This is fine...)

Finally, you're almost out.
Whats a um megacorp?
I heard your parents are bakers, Nagisa!
Cosplay? Is that where you dress up as various other people?
Huh? Natsuki, are you okay?
There we go! If you give up just because youre not good at it from the start, youll never improve and become awesome! Yknow, like me, or like Shiny Chariot!
Uh huh, yeah I see
Hmmm!
Ehehe! I have a feeling youre secretly kinda into this!
